snippet.title: In The Dark 2 Trailer
snippet.description:
In The Dark 2 is a brand new puzzle game releasing in Q4 2024 for ModRetro Chromatic, Game Boy, and Game Boy Color. 

Pre-order now to secure your copy! https://modretro.com/products/in-the-dark-2
Play the DEMO: https://pearacidic.itch.io/in-the-dark-2

In The Dark 2 is a 2D puzzle game for the Game Boy, filled with over 1,000 puzzles with the same solution: turn the lights out. Moving lights around the grid and learning the tricks of the process is similar to understanding theories and patterns like the board game of chess. In The Dark 2 expands the original formula by not only providing larger puzzles (4x4 and 5x5) but also by bringing the sci-fi story to a larger stage, where pieces will be revealed not only by beating the puzzles but unraveling the mystery of the purpose behind them through clues on each of the planets. 

In The Dark 2 is not just a puzzle game, included are a series of Top-Down Shoot 'em Up Missions so you can enjoy some Arcade Action between the mind-bending puzzles!

Gorgeous pixel art pushes past 8-bit visual expectations and showcases breathtaking vistas to explore and discover that bring classic point-and-click adventure games from the 80s and 90s to mind. With ease-of-use features like Undo and Quick Reset, In The Dark 2 plans to expand the mind with its mind-bending puzzles and thought-provoking story.

Features:
- DMG/Pocket Compatibility in addition to GBC
- Story Mode with detailed cutscenes, 200 Progressively Perplexing Curated Puzzles to solve in a 4x4 and 5x5 grid format, and a Science Fiction Mystery to uncover.
- A "Par" is set for each level to push you to find the quickest solution.
- An Undo Move Feature to help assess a recent move without locking it in when going for Pars.
- Free Play Mode - With over 1,000 possible puzzle combinations, you never know what you'll get!
- A variety of Optional Achievements offer additional challenges.
- 20 Detailed and Unique Theme Variants to Unlock and Enjoy in Free Play and Challenge Mode - Unlock through progress and clearing Pars!
- A Bonus arcade-style Shoot'em Up Game to play*

*requires a GBC

Music: Electric Commando by Ian Alex Mac – released under CC-BY 4.0.
